home.description: DM ARCHITECT is an interior design studio specializing in high-end residential, retail, and hospitality projects based in Belgrade, Serbia.

about.title: About the Studio
about.info: DM ARCHITECT is a Belgrade-based studio focused on original, bold and inspiring interior design. Our work merges function and emotion.
about.press: Selected publications featuring DM ARCHITECT will appear here.

projects.title: About DM ARCHITECT
projects.description: DM ARCHITECT is an interior design studio specializing in high-end projects...

retail.title: Retail Projects
retail.description: Explore DM ARCHITECT's unique retail interiors designed for premium showrooms, boutiques, and concept stores.

hotels.title: Hotel Projects
hotels.description: Discover elegant and functional hotel interiors by DM ARCHITECT.

residential.title: Residential Projects
residential.description: Take a look at our thoughtfully designed residential spaces blending function and personality.
